name: RCA LRK32G30RQ 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV with ROKU Streaming

reviews.name: RCA LRK32G30RQ 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV with ROKU Streaming
reviews.reviewText: Good TV, Good Features. I purchased 2 of these and was very disappointed when I saw the tv and realized there was no built in dvd player as stated in the description.
reviews.title: NO DVD PLAYER AS IT SAYS IN DESCRIPTION

reviews.name: RCA LRK32G30RQ 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV with ROKU Streaming
reviews.reviewText: I bought this TV to replace a 20 year old that we used for the kids to play the Wii and watch VCR tapes. as such, I wasn't looking for the best picture or the best sound, just a screen that would work. this one does that. And I was hoping the ROKU would give someone a chance to watch something when someone else was watching the other TV. I was hoping the ROKU streaming stick would be more than it is. the instructions you get with the TV show the Roku stick as a separate piece, and I was worried for a bit because the only separate pieces were the remote and the base. The Roku stick is built in, with a little plastic cage over it, like it is a wild animal or something. If I had been shopping for a TV for full time use, I probably would not have gotten the 720p model, but this one is fine for what we use it for.
reviews.title: it's a TV

reviews.name: RCA LRK32G30RQ 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV with ROKU Streaming
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my Mom who needed a TV in her bedroom. She loves it. Not too big, good picture.
reviews.title: The sound easily fills the room and doesn't distor

reviews.name: RCA LRK32G30RQ 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV with ROKU Streaming
reviews.reviewText: The sharpness of the picture and the outstanding sound is perfect for my living room space.
reviews.title: Great for watching the morning and evening news!

reviews.name: RCA LRK32G30RQ 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV with ROKU Streaming
reviews.reviewText: I have one concern. There is a faint white line that has appeared on the far right hand side of the screen, runs top to bottom and is clearly visible when the screen is black during channel changes.
reviews.title: happy with this purchase
